input.description:
power on when opened [optional] Power on the virtual machine when it is opened in the console.
valid values: true, false

enter full screen on power on [optional] Enter full screen mode when this virtual machine is powered on.
valid values: true, false
input.from: enter full screen on power on
input.to: enter full screen on power on

input.description:
close on power off or suspend [optional] Close the console application when the virtual machine is powered off or suspended.
valid values: true, false
input.from: close on power off or suspend
input.to: close on power off or suspend

replacement-token.name: enter full screen on power on

input.from: enter full screen on power on

replacement-token.name: close on power off or suspend

input.from: close on power off or suspend

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <console-preferences> <power-on-when-opened>${power on when opened}</power-on-when-opened> <enter-full-screen-on-power-on>${enter full screen on power on}</enter-full-screen-on-power-on> <close-on-power-off-or-suspend>${close on power off or suspend}</close-on-power-off-or-suspend> </console-preferences> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
